titles.title: A Just Society: A Place to Prosper Act of 2019
A Just Society: A Place to Prosper Act of 2019
A Just Society: A Place to Prosper Act of 2019
To create an equitable and stable rental housing market, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Financial Services, and in addition to the Committees on the Judiciary, and Transportation and Infrastructure, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
